TopicTitle: Something is missing, can you help?

Articles.Content:
Many times when i load a new craft it comes up in the Load menu as "Missing Parts" and will not load. Is there a mod that will look at the craft file and suggest whats missing? I thought i saw something like this sometime ago but can't find it now.

I'm using version 1.0.4. now.

Any help would be appreciated

Thank you

Keith

Ottawa, Canada

If the craft says there's missing parts it means you had a part from a mod on the craft, and you have removed the part or you updated a mod and the part was removed for example. If it was a stock non-mod parts craft before then i really dont know whats wrong.

You can upload the craft to kerbalx.com and it will tell you which mods were used.

Also, this probably belongs in the support forum.
As an alternative you could install Jebretary which also will tell you what mods are required to load the craft as well as which part it is.
